Posts.EditableText: you can access the inventory via using: ScopeInventory ( http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/ ... ntory.html ) along with 'for' or 'foreach' for the scripting, List usage is a bit difficult if you've never done any coding before and is a bit difficult to get right away. But, it's not too bad, if you're interested in learning to code, and am patient, as learning to code is a slow process and not easy right away too. we do have a 'journal' Library or 2 (I can't remember if a more advanced one was made or not) that you can use, but otherwise, you've got to craft~code it yourself, but it can certainly can be done.

Posts.EditableText: The "inv" or "i" (or, I think "inventory") command shows what you have in text games. By default so does the pane.
